projects.heading: Projects
projects.lead: Some of the recent Projects I have worked on

projects.heading: Canberra Trail Pass
projects.desc: Canberra Trail Pass is my final year mobile application project at ANU. Canberra Trail Pass tracks performance and progress on trail with city pass and discounts

projects.heading: ScreenAll ERP System
projects.desc: A Web based ERP system for SCRIM Products. This system automates the internal business processes of the company. The system is in beta stage and is used by the company

projects.heading: Remember To Call
projects.desc: Remember to call is a Android application which will allow you to keep in touch with your friends and family! The app sends you a notification so you know that it's time to call!

projects.heading: Control Over Web
projects.desc: See current temperature at home and get notification on your android device when the fire alarm or intrusion detection sensors gets activated

projects.heading: The Royal Taj
projects.desc: A website for Royal Taj (Restaurant), The website includes ajax drive menu which fetches data from a json file

projects.heading: Safety Field Audit
projects.desc: Web based application for Engineers to input and manage safety violations by staff during work in yards. Reports generated using SSRS.
